name: Ship Major Feature
narrative: The roadmap finally reaches a major milestone.

success.narrative: Press coverage highlights the quality of the release.

failure.narrative: A post-launch outage forces an exhausting hotfix sprint.

name: Launch Marketing Campaign
narrative: Fresh creative goes live across every channel.

success.narrative: Conversion rates spike as audiences respond enthusiastically.

failure.narrative: The messaging misses and the internet shrugs.

name: Pitch to Investors
narrative: You schedule back-to-back meetings with prominent funds.

success.narrative: Investors wire a term sheet before you leave the room.

failure.narrative: The feedback is brutal and rumours circulate online.

name: Run User Research Sprint
narrative: Researchers dig into interviews and usability tests for fresh insights.

name: Build Referral Program
narrative: You launch incentives to encourage organic invites.

success.narrative: Early adopters share their invite codes broadly.

failure.narrative: Rewards confuse users and some drift away.

name: Optimize Infrastructure
narrative: Engineers refactor critical services to lower hosting costs.

success.narrative: Performance improvements drop the cloud bill immediately.

failure.narrative: An unexpected regression forces you to overprovision servers.

name: Host Community Event
narrative: You bring power users together for demos, feedback, and camaraderie.

name: Renegotiate Vendor Contracts
narrative: Finance digs into vendor relationships searching for savings.

name: Experiment with Pricing
narrative: You A/B test a new pricing tier for your product.

success.narrative: Customers adopt the new tier and churn drops.

failure.narrative: Pricing confusion sparks frustration on social media.

name: Hire Growth Lead
narrative: You recruit a specialist to focus on onboarding and funnels.

success.narrative: The new hire lifts energy across product and marketing.

failure.narrative: The hire struggles to ramp and frustrates the team.
